summary.span: 提供使你能够在托管代码中使用补偿资源管理器 (CRM) 的类。

span.span: Provides classes that allow you to use a Compensating Resource Manager (CRM) in managed code.

summary.span: CRM 是 COM+ 提供的一项服务，可用于在 Microsoft 分布式事务处理协调器 (DTC) 事务中包含非事务性对象。

span.span: A CRM is a service provided by COM+ that enables you to include nontransactional objects in Microsoft Distributed Transaction Coordinator (DTC) transactions.

summary.span: 虽然 CRM 不提供完整资源管理器的功能，但它们却通过恢复日志提供事务性原子性（全有或全无行为）和持久性。

span.span: Although CRMs do not provide the capabilities of a full resource manager, they do provide transactional atomicity (all or nothing behavior) and durability through the recovery log.
